section.title: Installing the JBoss BPEL editor
section.para: At first, you need an Eclipse(3.5). You can get it from Eclipse Web Site.
The JBoss BPEL editor is included in JBoss Tools. You have some methods to install JBoss Tools. See Installing JBoss Tools for more information.
If you only want to install the JBoss BPEL editor, you may install it from JBoss Tools page. Please note that only JBoss Tools 3.1 or higher version include the JBoss BPEL editor.

section.title: Installing the JBoss BPEL Runtime
section.para: If you want to deploy a BPEL project to JBoss runtime, you need to download the JBoss BPEL Runtime by yourself. The JBoss BPEL Runtime is named RiftSaw. You can get it from JBoss RiftSaw page.
